detectors.description:
GriffinToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DevFundLock.sol#837-855) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DevFundLock.sol#847)
detectors.markdown:
[GriffinToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DevFundLock.sol#L837-L855) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DevFundLock.sol#L847)

GriffinToken.delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DevFundLock.sol#703-744) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(now <= expiry,Griffin::delegateBySig: signature expired) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DevFundLock.sol#742)
detectors.markdown:
[GriffinToken.delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DevFundLock.sol#L703-L744) uses timestamp for comparisons
